articles.title: B2B Growth: Your Daily B2B Marketing Podcast - Focusing on Operations for a Successful Demand Gen Strategy
articles.description: In this episode, Lesley Crews talks with Judy Sheriff, VP of Demand at Refine Labs, on the importance of operations in a demand gen strategy.

articles.title: B2B Growth: Your Daily B2B Marketing Podcast - Your Content Delivery Isn't as Good as You Think It Is
articles.description: In this episode, Timmy Bauer talks with Caitlin Ridge, Director of Strategic Communications at Formation, about why your content distribution and delivery isn't quite as great as you think it is.
articles.content: In this episode, Timmy Bauer talks with Caitlin Ridge, Director of Strategic Communications at Formation, about why your content distribution and delivery isn't quite as great as you think it is.

articles.title: B2B Growth: Your Daily B2B Marketing Podcast - How to Have Fun with Your Brand w/ Steve Pockross
articles.description:
In this episode, Timmy Bauer talks with Steve Pockross, CEO of Verblio, about one of the most underrated B2B tactics: how to have fun with your brand.
